about_the_game:
JumFrog

Game Introduction

In a deep, dark well, a frog yearns for freedom. In JumFrog, you embark on an amazing adventure, escaping a mysterious well with jumps. Can you safely guide the protagonist to the world outside the well? And what will that world look like?

JumFrog is not just a simple platformer game. It's a series of challenges, testing the player's skills in a harsh environment where even small mistakes are not tolerated. But the sweetness of success will be indescribable. With each jump, your heart races, and the tension from precarious situations where one mistake can ruin everything immerses the player even more.

However, this journey is filled with many questions. Where did this mysterious crowned frog come from? Why does it snow inside the deep well? What awaits in the world outside the well that the frog so desperately wants to escape to? And above all, what is the true identity of this well?

Game Features

Challenging Platformer Game

  • Pure challenge with no death or enemies

  • Only your skills and patience are the keys to success

Slingshot-like Jump Mechanism

  • Experience a unique jumping mechanism where you pull and launch the frog like a slingshot

  • Fine-tune your power control through crouching motions that change by 1 pixel and over 10 detailed animation frames

  • Create endless jumping patterns: pull lightly for safe jumps, strongly for long distances, or diagonally to target narrow gaps

  • The sensitive physics engine creates completely different results with subtle differences, allowing new approaches to the same platforms

  • Draw thousands of jumping trajectories with your fingertips to achieve perfect leaps

Creative Level Design

  • An exciting journey with new gimmicks appearing in each level

Cute Character

  • Charming pixel art graphics

  • A hardcore journey with an adorable main character

Addictive Gameplay

  • The charm that makes you say "just one more time"

  • Addictive nature that makes you want to try again even after failing

Mysterious Ghost Appearances

  • Occasionally, a mysterious ghost appears when you fall from great heights

  • The ghost speaks to you, impressed by your 'fall'. Is it encouragement… or mockery?

  • What could be the true identity of these ghosts?

I Sing When Times Get Tough

  • The frog's "ribbit ribbit" song you can hear anytime during your tough journey.

  • When you're tired from difficult challenges, how about singing a song?

  • It's okay if you fail. Take a short break.

Gameplay 

In JumFrog, every jump matters. One wrong jump can turn everything you've built so far into bubbles. However, don't get discouraged! The lessons and skills you gain in the process will make you stronger.

  • Careful Planning: Carefully observe the terrain and obstacles of each level.

  • Precise Aiming: Accurately adjust the angle and power of your jumps to land safely at your target point.

  • Quick Response: Quickly react to various obstacles such as moving platforms and disappearing blocks.

  • Perseverance: Don't be afraid of failure. Every attempt brings you one step closer to your goal.

Now, are you ready to take on this special adventure? The frog prince's journey towards freedom in the deep well is about to begin. What will the light at the end of that journey mean to you? Find the answer in JumFrog.

name: Jumfrog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD 4000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: Leap to Freedom! Guide a frog prince on an epic journey out of a deep, dark well in this challenging platformer. Every jump counts as you slingshot the frog with precision through tough obstacles. Can you conquer the fear of failure and find the light at the top?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Polish
